item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Plugins
item.description:
Plugins are the secret sauce of the HotelX API. Think of plugins as features you can implement to your basic development that will introduce at a request level all the business logic you normally would have had to implement on your side. These plugins can be used to fully customize the request and response in any way you wish, and can be added as your business grows and evolves. No need to aggregate responses now that you only have a few suppliers live?
[...]

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Release Notes
item.description: <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/release-notes/roadmap/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-road"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Roadmap</h3> <p>We have put together a GitHub Project where we will keep updating on the things weâ€™ve in our plans.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons"><img width="24px" src="/images/graphql.svg"/></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema Changes</h3> <p>It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/release-notes/breaking-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-eraser"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema breaking changes</h3> <p>Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/release-notes/changelog/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-commenting-o "></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Hotel-X Changelog</h3> </div> </div> </a>
